alert.note: Alert for Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:24PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 600 PM MST... At 524 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tonto National Monument, or near Roosevelt, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Roosevelt Dam, Tonto National Monument and Roosevelt Estates. This includes AZ Route 188 between mile markers 229 and 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
